name: nextcloud-deck
description: Nextcloud Deck is a kanban-style project management app built into the Nextcloud ecosystem. It supports boards, cards, due dates, and team workflows, ideal for task planning in self-hosted setups.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Visualize workflows with customizable columns for task stages and progress tracking

features.title: Card Management
features.description: Create detailed task cards with descriptions, checklists, and attachments

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Assign cards to users, mention team members, and track responsibility

features.title: Labels And Tags
features.description: Categorize cards with color-coded labels for quick visual organization

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Link Nextcloud files or upload documents directly to task cards
